hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: No matter what happens...Do not give up, do not complain, and do NOT stay up all night playing!

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #final treasures of Ice Cavern# are...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Piece of Heart#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##Zora's River## has #1# major item.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers the #Carpenters' Boss House#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bomb Bag#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Red Rupee#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #20 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Tree Compass#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #a Heart Container#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Lens of Truth Chest

HC (Malon).text: They say that a rock on #a ledge in the valley# hides #Damp√©'s Grave#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nut Capacity#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Map of the Spirit Temple#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that in #Gerudo Valley# the hammer unlocks #a Huge Rupee#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #Saria's Song#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that plundering #Lon Lon Ranch# is a foolish choice.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Map of the Fire Temple#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Temple of Time# is a foolish choice.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Nayru's Love# can be found at #Zora's Domain#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 4 Bottom

LH (Lab).text: They say that #the Water Temple# is on the path to #the Tower#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well GS West Inner Room

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nut Capacity#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #the Spooky Mask#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say Goron fabrics protect against more than fire.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Red Rupee#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #the Water Temple# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that ##Zora's Domain## has #5# major items.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Map of the Fire Temple#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Map of Jabu Jabu's Belly#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Map of the Spirit Temple#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path to #the Key#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bomb Bag#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #a Zora Scale# can be found at #Zora's Domain#.
